txt.en: 'There is nothing we can't do as long as we put our minds to it!'
'This place will never be the same!'
'These supplies are vital to our success!'
'I don't know why you keep going on and on. It is useless to complain!'
'The days of Khazad-dûm are ended. No use thinking otherwise!'
'See what you have done!'
'What I wouldn't do for a pint!'
'Hurry with that cart, the supplies wait for no dwarf!'
'We will build this place back to full glory!'
'Leave me be, I need to get this cart back in action!'
'Ow! Curses! I've only got two thumbs, and that's one down....'
'We must make ready the forges if we are to re-take Khazad-dûm.'
'To think, I shall forge steel and mithril in the great halls of my fore-fathers!'
'See to the forges my brothers, they are the life of Khazad-dûm!'
'So much to do...we could have a thousand dwarves and still not have enough hands!'
'The sooner the forges are rebuilt, the sooner we shall be able to drive the goblins forth!'
'Do you hear that? The sound of hammers once again rings in the halls of Khazad-dûm!'
'Watch those crates lad! You'd look a poor sort all piled under them!'
'Let the hammers ring! Let our enemies quail at the sound of our steel!'
'It won't be long now lads! These halls shall be ours again!'
'There is no shame in work well done.'
'We will get you back to the supply lines in no time.'
'Keep up the good work, friend.'
'Watch your beast better next time.'
'This is slowing us down considerably. I wish you a quick recovery.'
'Those darn animals! I would still be on my delivery if it wasn't for that dumb beast!'
'Watch the road, they say! Do they know how dark it is in here?'
Expedition Leader
'You try guiding a beast through these windy passages!'
'I'm getting too old for this. I miss my home and my wife!'
'Keep up your spirits! Khazad-dûm will be restored!'
'The dwarves need your help! We must get these supplies delivered!'
'I do really hope the supply lines are cleared soon.'
'Do not fear, we will prevail!'
'Look at what the great Khazad-dûm has become!'
'Mazog and his allies will be driven from these very halls!'
'When will the Orcs leave us alone?'
'It is time for our return to glory!'
'Once this was a place of wonder and knowledge. Now....'
